replies.body:
Hi folks

I just got called about this, will do some digging and find out what is happening. Update soon

Cheers!
Thanks daddy{{champion:117}}

Update: Looks like something went boom on the OCE server while we were running a scheduled maintenance for the North American LoL server.   Not entirely sure why yet.   The good news is things *seem* to be recovering, but thankfully our engineering teams are already up and working, so were quickly on the case.

Second/Final Update:

Hopefully you are all happily playing URF & ranked again now, as we've re-enabled all queues.   If it's still broken for you, please let me know! 

For a bit more context on what happened (still don't know exactly) - The North America server shares a datacentre with some parts of the Oceania server.   On all our servers we usually perform maintenance every couple of weeks at a time that is off-peak for that server's local players (ie. middle of the night / early morning).  

In this case, we were working on a device that is associated primarily with the NA server,  and has previously been worked on with no impact to OCE.  Unfortunately this time it did cause impact, so we've got to do some homework now to figure out why now....

Apologies for the interruption to the evenings games :'(
my account is in the queue forever..........can not find a match
Same goes for me....and now it's saying im banned from the queues for "declining" too many games...I didnt even get the pop up to join the game....and the timer still continues to tick

> [{quoted}](name=Mindstar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=s0vZ3I7n,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2019-10-30T10:58:29.080+0000)
>
> Hi folks
> 
> I just got called about this, will do some digging and find out what is happening. Update soon
> 
> Cheers!

thank you for working quickly to fix the issue, can you please explain the issue with ranked and how long it will be for it to comeback up?
We'll bring it back as soon as we're confident that the service is stable again.  I can't give a "for sure" estimate, but our aim is always "as soon as it's safe".
thanks for fast reaction to getting service back online {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Thanks Mindstar! It's working for me now.
Now I enjoy a cute game of URF with the best streamer/best league player OCE, TheMuxable. What a cutie!
yay thankyou so much!
TY DEVS NOT TRASH I WAS WRONG BUT STILL FIX UR GAME. TY MINDSTAR U CAN MAKE A GAME AFTER ALL
chur bro
TheMuxable (best streamer/best league player OCE)  is able to join/make lobbies still and play games, however I can't so I have no clue what's going on.
It me {{summoner:31}}

Upvote, same here.
Red ! on every que mode
ikr potato server?
yeah there are red warning signals in from of all the game options and now ranked has been removed, what is going on?
they are having a maintenance update, servers will be down for like an hour or so
someone on my friend list can start a game tho
rip
@riot
Same problem here cant join any game but can create custom game its their servers
Now they've just updated it to ranked queues are temporarily suspended. All game queues are suspended but they just want to play it off like it's no big deal.... that doesn't feel good

It has since been updated to a general "lobbies are doing something funky". The ranked one seems to be a template one they just put up whenever ranked queues go down, so it's probably faster to get up than a custom message is.

As I understand it some lobbies are still functioning normally so they don't want to bring everything down if they don't have to. Ranked queues *have* to go down to maintain queue and matchmaking integrity though. For normals, it's not such a big deal.

Follow the red posts though, it should be back up soon :)

Already reported a bug and the server status has literally no updates.

OCE not important once again
Like 20 minutes ago our lobby went funny and now when you log in there's a wait timer and then all queues have a red triangle
plz fix Riot.
hopefully the issue is resolved soon.
TRUUUUUUUUUUUUUEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
To everyone blowing up like a child. please just chill, its a free game after all.
Not free if you spent $$$ on it
that is your choice

Finding match forever....and now it's saying im banned from the queues for "declining" too many games...I didnt even get the pop up to join the game....and the timer still continues to tick. Hope this gets fixed asap
Weird, some people can still create and join lobbies, meanwhile others can't join anything and pretty much every mode has a red ! triangle. Submitted a ticket, but I guess we'll have to wait and see.
Wtf. One account works, one account doesn't. FIRE CLUELESS DEVS. CANT MAKE STABLE OR CONSISTENT GAME. FIX UR TRASH.
